infos.value: If you are struck by magic such as Bio or Sleep, it may cause status ailments such as <color=#0000ff>Poison</color> or <color=#0000ff>Sleep</color>.
Being inflicted with such ailments will put you at a <color=#0000ff>disadvantage</color>, gradually taking damage or becoming unable to act for a period of time.
However, you can recover from these ailments by using <color=#0000ff>items</color> such as Antidotes or the white magic spell <color=#0000ff>Esuna</color>.
Additionally, you can prevent these ailments by using the Cleric ability <color=#0000ff>Calamity Guard</color> beforehand.
The current enemy will frequently attack with status ailments. Make sufficient use of Lady Machérie's ability during this battle.
If you choose to leave status ailments to fate, you may lose your chance at victory. Let us therefore take effective measures against them.
